ISSUE.TITLE: Support `.drone.yml` and `.drone.yaml` variant
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I made the mistake of setting up my project with '.drone.yaml' file. I know the project setup instruction specifically say to create a '.drone.yml' file but it should really support '.drone.yaml' as well. i mean the official website is yaml.org and I think the '.yaml' extension is more widely used. I was only able to figure out after getting help from the Gitter drone channel, shout out to tboerger!
